title: Toxic
description: When your soulmate betrays you, who are you supposed to turn to?Poetry in motion in the pool, anyone with eyes could see Thea was on her way to the top. Through scholarships and grants, Thea’s talents take her from the gutter to the Olympics, but along the way, her past is a spectre she can’t escape. Adam Ramsden had it all. A successful swimming career, a Senator in the family, and a face that belonged on a billboard. What he didn’t have?Theodosia Kinkade. The second he saw her, he knew she was his. The second she saw him, she knew he was hers. Made for each other. Forged to belong in one another’s arms. Two souls who’d been waiting to meet since time itself began... But who said soul mates had it easy? At Rosemore Academy where envy stirs, hatred forms, and safety is compromised, not even soul mates can endure the forces that tear them apart... Above the surface, all might seem calm, but in the depths, secrets can be deadly... can their love survive? FIND OUT IN ABOVE THE SURFACE.
author: Serena Akeroyd
